info: Choosing the right bathroom to fit your style?
Are you looking to turn your bathroom into a room of functionality and luxury?
Or maybe you are looking to expand the space you have without a complete remodel? Either way, you have come to the right place
Our professional designers and organizers work with you to make better use of the space you have and turn it into the bathroom you have always wanted.

details.description: This classic and calm bathroom features oversized rectangular tile work and a gorgeous glass shower with intricate tile detail for added textural interest on the walls and floor.
This bathroom remodel features the classic combination of dark wood cabinets, stunning natural granite and tile floors for a finished look that is relaxed and refined.
A beautiful tile shower remodel with intricate tile work detail for enhanced interest and beauty.
Choose from a large selection of bathroom accessories and finshes, including this modern bathtub faucet.
We create custom shower and bathroom accessories, like this shower box, that are fit just for your needs and wants.
This intricate shower floor tile work helps to demonstrate the large amount of designs and patterns that Classy Kitchen and Bath.
Glass shower edge demonstrating the quality of glass work done by Classy Kitchen and Bath.
Choose from a large selection of bathroom hardware and accessories that fit your budget and style.
This spacious bathroom features, Classy Kitchen and Bath's Rome style cabinets, quartz countertops, updated tile and a glass shower.
This stunning and modern bathroom features modern style cabinets, quartz countertops and beautiful stylized tile.

details.displayName: Aviano and Volterra Vanity in Brown Pearwood
details.description: This beautiful, classic bathroom features Aviano style cabinets, quartz countertop, open shelving and sleek silver hardware.

details.displayName: Brown Pearwood Vanity with Rome Doors
details.description: A simple vanity featuring our Rome cabinet doors in brown pearwood and granite countertops that add a sleek and expensive look.

details.displayName: Brown Pearwood Vanity with Vessel Sink
details.description: A simple vanity featuring a vessel sink and brown pearwood Rome cabinet doors.
Choose from a large selection of bathroom accessories and finishes, including this modern style bathtub.
Sleek and simple, this modern black bathroom is a complete oasis.

details.displayName: Elegant Bath in Antique White and Quartz Tub Surround
details.description: His and hers bathroom cabinet sinks surrounded by a beautiful quartz bathtub.
Stunning antique white bathroom cabinets with timeless quartz countertop.

details.displayName: Elegant Bath in Antique White and Quartz Countertop
details.description: Large bathroom quartz countertop with custom antique white bathroom cabinets.
These glazed cabinets in our Venice style create a classic and timeless look you can enjoy for years to come.
Classic Milano doors in brown pearwood create a beautiful bathroom vanity.
A beautiful bathroom featuring oversized tile, granite countertops and Milano cabinets in Gunstock Walnut.
Natural knotty Alder vanity with granite countertops create a traditional and timeless look.

details.displayName: Rome Antique White Vanity with Glaze
details.description: Antique white cabinets in Rome style with a glaze.
This classic double sink vanity features rome cabinets in white.
Gorgeous wood vanity with natural granite countertops.
Sleek and modern, this bathroom features a tiled mirror and glass vanity with stunning shower tile work.
This tuscan style bathroom features Verona style cabinets in classic Arbor Myrtle.

details.displayName: Arbor Myrtle Double Vanity with Sienna Doors
details.description: Double sink vanity featuring our Sienna cabinet doors in a dark arbor myrtle stain and quartz countertops.
An ornate, custom bathroom featuring our rome style cabinets, oversized tile and granite countertop.
This oversized, thick quartz vanity creates a modern, sleek bathroom.
